name: PowerPlanDisplay
tagline: Shows your active Windows powerplan in a window containing all the available powerplans, and allows you to change powerplan with a single click.
body:
PowerPlanDisplay
==========

Shows your active Windows powerplan in a window containing all the available powerplans, and allows you to change powerplan with a single click.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
